metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18483 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
The get_count function in cplus-dem.c in GNU libiberty, as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.31, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (malloc called with the result of an integer-overflowing calculation) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted string, as demonstrated by c++filt.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-18483` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

binutils - 2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.3
binutils-aarch64-linux-gnu - 2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.3
binutils-alpha-linux-gnu - 2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.3
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabi - 2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.3

criterions.comment: binutils package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.30-21ubuntu1~18.04.3').
